body: Language fixes.
Attempted to fix a problem where sound would stop working after a time.
Fixed link loop bug.

name: 2.4.4-r1
body: Update to Gradle files for Fdroid.
Added a request to access storage permissions when setting custom backgrounds.
Bugfix for exporting database.

- Now requests permission to access storage in Android 6.0.
- Installation to SD card now possible.
- German localisation included.
A crashing bug has been fixed.
Optional sounds for + and - buttons.
Fixed a bug with setting alert tones.

name: 2.3.7-r2
body: Further bugfixes to text size in Android 4.0.x.

name: 2.3.7-r1
body:
Bugfix for an issue with Android 4.0. 

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15162821/why-does-removeongloballayoutlistener-throw-a-nosuchmethoderror
Fixed a text wrap issue on counting, added an optional count multiplier, fixed database upgrade bug.

- Switch focus to text box when adding a count to a new project.
- Added a settings option to disable the requirement for unique count names in a project.
The project list will now open after having created a project.

- Project notes can now be shared.
- Alerts at a value of 0 will work when counts are re-set.
- Some spurious warnings about links will no longer appear.
A bug with drop-down lists has been fixed, and another bug with recursive links has been partially addressed.
Audible alerts are now available and a small bug has been fixed.
Increase/decrease calculator functionality.
Per-count notes are now available in addition to project notes.

- Fixed a screen rotation bug.
- Added sort order for project listing.
- Added option to increase project notes font size.
Fix for a crash caused by deleting a linked count.
Linked counts should now auto-reset properly.
The font now changes when counting to accommodate counts > 99.
More buttons have been added to the action bar.
Stability improvements when resuming from pause.
Various small bugfixes.
The plus and minus buttons have been made clearer and a missing save button has been added back in.
The project delete buttons have been added back in.

A preliminary French translation has been added.
The project delete button has been removed and long-pressing to delete returned.
A background image problem on the welcome screen has been fixed.
An attempt has been made to address a crashing problem when selecting images on a Kindle.
